医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，扩大 FDA 批准的癌症药物适应症需要大量患者新抗癌药物二次批准所需的患者参与者数量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Extending-FDA-approved-cancer-drug-indicates-requires-high- Patient-numbers-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Extending-FDA-approved-cancer-drug-indicates-requires-high- Patient-numbers-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=480fd968-f6b0-4c30-8d5b-1c5cecff2e4a Fri, 29 Sep 2023 06:08:00 -0400 Extending FDA-approved cancer drug indications requires high patient numbers, study finds
监测唾液代谢变化的传感器可快速诊断糖尿病用于无创测定唾液等体液中葡萄糖的传感器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Sensors-that-monitor-salivary-metabolic-changes-to-rapidly-diagnose-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Sensors-that-monitor-salivary-metabolic-changes-to-rapidly-diagnose-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98340f78-e5f9-46c4-bb08-df0ceb873ec4 Fri, 29 Sep 2023 05:27:00 -0400 Sensors that monitor salivary metabolic changes to rapidly diagnose diabetes
用于诊断创伤后应激障碍的人工智能模型人工智能是否可能成为创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）诊断的一种有前途的策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Artificial-intelligence-models-for-diagnosing-post-traumatic-stress-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Artificial-intelligence-models-for-diagnosing-post-traumatic-stress-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f57e8d57-e42f-48d0-b77f-5ea3ef86493e Fri, 29 Sep 2023 04:42:00 -0400 Artificial intelligence models for diagnosing post-traumatic stress disorder
黑枸杞有哪些药理特性？黑果枸杞成分的药理作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/What-are-the-pharmacological-properties-of-black-goji-berry.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/What-are-the-pharmacological-properties-of-black-goji-berry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87b0771d-d057-46cf-a13d-1d5f64951181 Fri, 29 Sep 2023 04:14:00 -0400 What are the pharmacological properties of black goji berries?
研究揭示染色体不稳定引起的 DNA 损伤如何增加癌症侵袭性染色体不稳定是细胞分裂过程中染色体数量和结构快速变化的现象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Study-reveals-how-DNA-damage-caused-by-chromosomal-instability-increases-cancer-侵袭性.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Study-reveals-how-DNA-damage-caused-by-chromosomal-instability-increases-cancer-pressiveness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5d6a1ea-c38c-4c69-820b-c492f73b6edc Thu, 28 Sep 2023 23:48:00 -0400 Study reveals how DNA damage caused by chromosomal instability increases cancer invasiveness
养成更健康的习惯：比利时学校试行 DRINK 计划，用软饮料代替水DRINK 计划旨在通过营养和可持续发展干预措施，减少比利时学童的含糖饮料消费并增加自来水摄入量。这项长期研究在 168 所学校实施，将评估这些策略在促进健康习惯方面的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Turning-the-tap-on-healthier-habits-Belgian-schools-Trial-DRINK-program-to-swap-soft-drink-for-water。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Turning-the-tap-on-healthier-habits-Belgian-schools-Trial-DRINK-program-to-swap-soft-drink-for-water。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=033eb853-a4bd-493c-ac31-40cf348c78bb Thu, 28 Sep 2023 23:08:00 -0400 Turning the tap on healthier habits: Belgian schools trial DRINK program to swap soft drink for water
研究揭示了新冠疫情对儿童和青少年生活的深远影响由英国国家健康与护理研究所 (NIHR) 资助的纳菲尔德初级保健健康科学系、牛津大学以及斯特灵大学和阿伯丁大学的最新研究，凸显了长期新冠疫情可能产生的深远影响儿童和青少年的学校经历和更广泛的生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Research-shines-light-on-the-profound-effect-of-Long-Covid-on-the-lives-of-children-and-young-人民.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Research-shines-light-on-the-profound-effect-of-Long-Covid-on-the-lives-of-children-and-young- people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc454e3a-333e-422f-aff9-e3fb235aedcc Thu, 28 Sep 2023 23:01:36 -0400 Research shines light on the profound effect of Long Covid on the lives of children and young people
雾化 ACE2 在实验室和小鼠测试中中和了 COVID-19 变种德克萨斯大学西南分校的研究人员开发了一种雾化的突变形式 ACE2，可以有效中和细胞培养物和小鼠中的各种 SARS-CoV-2 变体。该研究表明，这种经过修饰的 ACE2 对 COVID-19 具有良好的预防和治疗潜力，特别是其易于雾化给药。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Aerosolized-ACE2-neutralizes-COVID-19-variants-in-lab-and-mice-tests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Aerosolized-ACE2-neutralizes-COVID-19-variants-in-lab-and-mice-tests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ac6d12e-b951-4ba4-89e2-9a1605a3fb6c Thu, 28 Sep 2023 22:49:00 -0400 Aerosolized ACE2 neutralizes COVID-19 variants in lab and mice tests
改善老年人肺癌护理的挑战和机遇一篇新的社论论文发表在《Aging》（被 MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和 Web of Science 的“Aging-US”）第 15 卷第 17 期，题为“Promising trends inplung cancer care, but我们是否忽视了大多数人？” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Challenges-and-opportunities-for-better-lung-cancer-care-for-the-elderly.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Challenges-and-opportunities-for-better-lung-cancer-care-for-the-elderly.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73476cc3-5bb5-47a6-8e5e-c30b0c1bf977 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 22:13:17 -0400 Challenges and opportunities for better lung cancer care for the elderly
灵长类动物模型揭示了长期新冠病毒对血糖影响的线索，并暗示了疫苗的益处该研究使用非人类灵长类动物模型来探索长期新冠病毒与葡萄糖代谢紊乱之间的联系，发现了正相关性。疫苗接种似乎可以改善血糖控制，这表明疫苗接种可能在控制长期新冠症状方面发挥作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Primate-model-unlocks-clues-to-long-COVIDs-impact-on-blood-sugar-hints-at-vaccine-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Primate-model-unlocks-clues-to-long-COVIDs-impact-on-blood-sugar-hints-at-vaccine-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=846a1d23-da0c-4899-86f3-75501edf1471 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 22:04:00 -0400 Primate model unlocks clues to long-COVID's impact on blood sugar, hints at vaccine benefits
